file_content.text: Blazing spear is go. Move out!
Yeah! Let's go, boys--we're gonna give the Imps a taste of Corellian hospitality!
We did it!
We did it! We took 'em down, every last one of 'em!
I told you blowing the equipment was the way to go!
We won, most certainly. I only hope the cost wasn't too high.
Today was a victory. Enjoy it.
Worry about that later.
You're right, of course.
You can't put a price on freedom.
No cost is too high.
No, I suppose you can't.
You see? We did it, and we kept the factory standing. I told you it could be done!
Yeah, yeah, whatever. That was one for the holovids, boys. Really incredible.
It isn't easy to pull off an ambush like that. You did well.
You should be proud.
You hear that? Even a major in the Special Forces is impressed!
Think you guys can make it back to your hideouts?
Can you get home on your own?
Oh yeah, no sweat, Major.
Where's the gratitude?
Oh, yeah, of course. We never could've pulled this off without you here to help us!
We were very fortunate to have you to lead us, Major.
We'd better get going, boys. Gotta clean this place up and clear out before more Imps show up. Thanks again, soldier!
Bring it on!
We're ready for anything!
All right, everybody's here! Let's get this party started!
We brought plenty of explosives and plenty of shooters. We're ready.
Who knows this factory best?
Tell me about this place.
Hendrick and I were both employed here before the invasion began.
Have you people seen real combat?
You really think you're ready?
We have. Hendrick and I were working in this very factory when the Imperials invaded, and we've been fighting ever since.
Yeah, I've been thinking--we could rig a lot of this equipment to blow. You know, really tear the Imps to shreds!
Set up however you want. Just don't get in my way.
Do your own thing.
As you wish.
Me and Oudon used to work here--we can rig this place into a serious deathtrap. Equipment blowing up left and right!
What? Stop and think, Hendrick--if we destroy this place, where will we work when the Imperials are gone?
We're here to wipe these Imps out, and rigging the equipment to blow in their faces is the best way to do it!
If rigging the equipment to blow improves our odds, we'll do it.
Sabotage will help us.
Corellia will need to rebuild--you'll need this place intact.
Don't wreck the factory.
I hope this is the right call. We could be putting ourselves at a big disadvantage.
If the Imperials make us destroy our own factories, then we've already lost. Let's just get our people into position.
Consideration for local infrastructure is always preferable.
The unparalleled industry of the Republic must be preserved!
With trepidation comes risk. We must be cautious not to give our enemies too great an advantage.
Uh... whatever you say. Let's just get our people into position.
You're depriving the galaxy of a real masterpiece. I could've done great things with this place....
I'm... sure you'll get other opportunities. Let's get everyone to their positions.
I'm glad you agree. Now, let's get everyone into position.
Hendrick? Sherro? All set?
We're ready. Do you have any final orders, Major?
We all want to send the Imps packing. The best way to do it is to hold the line and work as a team.
Stick together.
We'll follow your lead.
We're not here to prove anything. Just stay alive and make sure the Imps don't.
Nobody try to be a hero.
That sounds like as good a plan as any.
These Imps are here to kill you and everyone you love! Your only chance is to kill them all first!
Fight for your lives!
Let's make 'em pay!
If we have to turn this building into a smoking crater, so be it.
Level the whole place!
Right on!
But think of the long-term effects! The people who'll be left without jobs!
Look, I've seen guys try to take the soft approach--they all went home in boxes. Just rig the equipment.
Service Code 15-A, subsection two: Collateral property damage is acceptable under pressing circumstances, determined at the discretion of the ranking officer present.
If the commander of Havoc Squad believes these actions are necessary, then they are necessary!
All right, all right! Take it easy! If you want to blow up our future, go for it.
We're saving our future, Oudon. So let's get to work.
One is wise to consider the future, but only after considering the present.
What? I'm sorry, I don't speak your language.
It doesn't matter, Oudon. We're following the soldiers' lead. Let's get to it.
If I were you, I'd worry more about getting shot in the next few minutes than I would about having a job down the line.
The decision has been made, Oudon. Let's get to work.
Everything is ready. Is there anything else you want to say, Major?
We all want to take the Imps down. If we're going to do it, we need to hold the line and work together.
Stick together.
We'll follow your commands.
We're here to win, not to prove anything. Stick to your posts and stay alive.
Nobody try to be a hero.
Sounds good to me.
These Imps want to grind your planet into dust! If you want to stop them, you'll stop them here!
Fight for your lives!
Let's show 'em what we're made of!
For Corellia!
